name: Nyctli Swarm
condition_immunities: charmed, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, stunned

actions.name: Stingers
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm’s space. Hit: 21 (6d6) piercing damage, or 10 (3d6) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hp or fewer. The target must make a DC 16 Constitution saving throw. On a failure, a creature takes 42 (12d6) necrotic damage and is blinded for 1 minute. On a success, a creature takes half the damage and isn’t blinded. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Douse Light
actions.desc: As the nyctli, except the swarm can’t dispel light created by a spell of 6th level or higher.

special_abilities.name: Swarm
special_abilities.desc: The swarm can occupy another creature’s space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny nyctli. The swarm can’t regain hp or gain temporary hp.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting (1/Day)
special_abilities.desc: The nyctli swarm can innately cast fear, requiring no material components. Its innate spellcasting ability is Charisma.
